_sText: Winter season has arrived and a little office building somewhere in the northern part of Ontario (Canada) has been snowed in by a severe storm. Windows are sealed off and snow is creeping in through the ventilation system and sneaking under the garage doors. People have been taken hostage and it's up to you to save them. It's been a long time since I made this map but have finally gotten around to getting it to compile. I'm not going to update this map anymore so if there's something you think needs changing, feel free to do so yourself by downloading the .vfm here. There's 32 spawn points (Maybe 40. I should've checked before uploading this haha, no that's not funny.) Custom nav made by myself, including place painting (They're not shown in the screen shots because I made them after and didn't feel like re-taking the screen shots.) Enjoy the map. Special thanks to chizbone for tuning the nav file.
